LayoutNode.Content: SHOPPING 47 Cheap Summer Dresses That'll Make The Heat A Little More Bearable Flowing, colorful, and easy-to-wear summer dresses — all for under 30 bucks! Posted on May 17, 2018, 21:01 GMT Elena Garcia BuzzFeed Staff
LayoutNode.SRC:
Shopping

47 Cheap Summer Dresses That'll Make The Heat A Little More Bearable

Flowing, colorful, and easy-to-wear summer dresses — all for under 30 bucks!

Posted on May 17, 2018, 21:01 GMT Elena Garcia
BuzzFeed Staff

LayoutNode.Content: We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. Oh, and FYI — prices are accurate and items in stock as of time of publication.

LayoutNode.Content: 1. A button-down midi dress that'll become your go-to summer dress for any occasion.
LayoutNode.SRC: 1.A button-down midi dress that'll become your go-to summer dress for any occasion.

LayoutNode.Content: amazon.com
LayoutNode.SRC: amazon.com

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "Adorable dress! The material is flowy and soft. Great dress for a summer outing! I usually wear size 6 and bought a medium, and it worked perfectly — 5'6" and the dress hit right below the knee. The background color is navy. There are two pockets at the front — LOVE pockets! But they are made from pretty soft material so you can't really keep much in there." — J.Y. Get it from Amazon for $20.99 (available in sizes S-2XL and 28 prints).
LayoutNode.SRC: Promising review: "Adorable dress! The material is flowy and soft. Great dress for a summer outing! But they are made frompretty soft material so you can't really keep much in there." —J.Y.Get it from Amazon for $20.99 (available in sizes S-2XL and 28 prints).

LayoutNode.Content: anrdoezrs.net

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "This dress is such a stunner, I love it! The colors are so bright, bold, and cheery. Overall, this dress has a strong '90s vibe — I know because I wore dresses like this back then, lol." — Meg D. Get it from Forever 21 for $22.90 (available in sizes 2X-3X).

LayoutNode.Content: 3. A ruffled-hem mini dress so unique everyone will be asking you where you got it.
LayoutNode.SRC: 3.A ruffled-hem mini dress so unique everyone will be asking you where you got it.

LayoutNode.Content: amazon.com
LayoutNode.SRC: amazon.com

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "I sized up to a large and I'm 5'5", 155 lbs. The large fit me with some room to move. If you're a size 8 in US, the large will fit you perfectly. I am satisfied with the fit. I do not like my clothing tight on me. There is one belt loop and strap on the dress to tie on the side. The ruffles are so darn cute! There is a zipper down the side so that you can fit into your outfit. The quality is great and I will be wearing this all summer!" — Schimiggy Get it from Amazon for $3.99+ (available in sizes S-XL and in blue and gray).
LayoutNode.SRC: Promising review: "I sized up to a large and I'm 5'5", 155 lbs. The large fit me with some room to move. If you're a size 8 in US, the large will fit you perfectly. LayoutNode.Content: amazon.com
LayoutNode.SRC: amazon.com

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "I absolutely love this dress! I used it for a shoot in Malibu, and both the other model and photographer asked where I got the dress. I am 5'3" and it fits me well. It flows nicely as I walk and in the wind. It's super comfortable to wear and the fabric is good quality." — Kaila Yu Get it from Amazon for $18.99+ (available in sizes XXS-XXL and in nine colors).

LayoutNode.Content: 5. A tie-front midi dress that'll give your midsection a little peekaboo time.

LayoutNode.Content: amazon.com
LayoutNode.SRC: amazon.com

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "Absolutely in love. By far one of the cutest dresses I’ve gotten on Amazon, easily. I love the style, color, cut, EVERYTHING. I got a medium and I'm 5'4", 145 lbs., and a 34D. I adore the sash in the front to tie and the buttons you get all the way down the front. It’s a nice new twist on a vintage-style dress. It’s sexy but still appropriate. To my surprise, it is NOT transparent. I have a huge tattoo on my stomach and you can’t see it. The material is just fine. I think it’s a great buy and I highly recommend." — Michaela Alves

It is a little loose without being baggy, and definitely not skintight. The fabric is not see-through, it is actually extremely soft but still light/not a heavy fabric. The adjustable straps make it the perfect fit. LOVE!" — Get it from Amazon for $15.34+ (available in sizes XS-XL and in eight colors).

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "Very comfy and soft. I'm a size 18, 38D, and I bought the 2X. I probably could have gone with a 1X because it has a lot of stretch. I haven't tried it with a bra on, but I'm sure it would show through the cutout in the front, FYI. The straps are adjustable too. Can't wait to wear it!!!!" — Carolyn M. Get it from Forever 21 for $17.90 (available in sizes 0X-3X).

LayoutNode.Content: 15. A super-soft cotton beach cover-up that'll easily go from poolside to lunch during your next tropical vacation.
LayoutNode.SRC: 15.A super-soft cotton beach cover-up that'll easily go from poolside to lunch during your next tropical vacation.

LayoutNode.Content: amazon.com
LayoutNode.SRC: amazon.com

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "I bought this cover-up for my birthday trip to Ormond Beach here in Florida! I love this classic-style cover-up — it looked so elegant and helped me keep things covered! I love that it's a beautiful flowy fabric and one size will fit most! It is really well-made and has a really cute and sexy fit. The weight of the fabric was perfect, it has enough coverage (it's not fully see-through even wet) and doesn't get too heavy when wet! This cover-up also saved me from the usual sunburn, and for that alone, I would recommend this to anyone who plans to be in the sun for a good length of time! It kept me cool and let me enjoy the beach and ocean all day long!" — Ambee Nicole

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "I love this dress! It’s lightweight, the colors are pretty and bright, and it fits as expected. I’m 5’4” and 130 lbs., I normally wear an 8 or 10 in jeans and a medium in tops. The medium for this dress fit just right and came a couple of inches above my knees in the front. All of the buttons are real so be prepared to fasten like 40 of them! I would definitely recommend this as a nice, casual, summer dress. :)" — Katie M. Get it from Amazon for $20.99 (available in sizes XS-XXL and in five prints).

LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "The first words out of my mouth when I looked in the mirror were 'Oh my god' because I didn't have high hopes for me looking great in a dress with this mom bod. Even the length isn't too short, and the fabric is not see-through." — CK Get it from Amazon for $3.99+ (available in sizes S-XL).

The fit is spot-on. I live in Texas and the summer months are extremely hot and sundresses/maxi dresses are the perfect outfits to wear in the summer heat. LayoutNode.Content: Promising review: "Great purchase for the price. Just what I was looking for! Comfy summer dress for any occasion. Being a momma, I'm always looking for things just like this. You can dress it up or down and it has pockets!! Can't get much better. Fit is perfect for me — I'm typically a S-M (120 lbs., 32C) and it's like it was made just for me! Armholes are a little longer than most dresses but I like that for the summer so sweat marks don't show! Not see through so great for any pair of comfy undies. Cute with a belt and also cute with none." — B&E Worthington
